sobre.intro: Computer Engineering Student, technology enthusiast and skateboarder in my free time. Looking for resources and knowledge in the area of technology, always looking for greater evolution in the areas of life.

experiencia.texto: Currently studying Computer Engineering - UEPG, where I had my first contact with programming. After some time I found myself in web development, area that i've been working with. I got my first job as an intern at Agência Ade!, where I later became a permanent employee.
experiencia.tecnologias: Since my first project, I have been searching for technologies that increase productivity and improve application performance, always aiming for better results. To achieve this, I use the best of the web development world: NextJS with TailWind CSS.

placeholders.mensagem: Write here which service you want, ask for quotes, or send your questions.. I'll be happy to help :)

erro: Oh no, looks like you got lost! Perhaps this page doesn't exist yet..
